Putnam Exam | 2002: A1

\begin{array}{c}\n2002-A 1 \\\n\frac{d^{n}}{d x^{n}}\left(\frac{1}{x^{k}-1}\right)=\frac{P_{n}(x)}{\left(x^{k}-1\right)^{n+1}} \\\n\text { Find } P_{n}(1)\n\end{array}[imath]2002-A 1 [/imath] [imath]\frac{d^{n}}{d x^{n}}\left(\frac{1}{x^{k}-1}\right)=\frac{P_{n}(x)}{\left(x^{k}-1\right)^{n+1}} [/imath] [imath]\text { Find } P_{n}(1)[/imath]
